definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Optimal time for hand pollination was within 2 to 3 days after flower opening.
sentences.chinese: 單花序開放後2～3天內是人工授粉的最佳時期。

sentences.english: Flowers hermaphrodite, small, white, arranged in compound umbels.
sentences.chinese: 花雜性，小，白色，排成復傘形花序。

sentences.english: Panicle branches proximally smooth or sparsely scabrid angled.
sentences.chinese: 圓錐花序分枝下部的平滑的或疏生粗糙的有棱。

sentences.english: Inflorescence racemose to 7 cm at fructification , densely yellow pubescent.
sentences.chinese: 總狀的花序達7釐米在果期，密被黃色短柔毛。

sentences.english: Simulation of inflorescences is an important part of "virtual plant growth".
sentences.chinese: 花序的模擬是“虛擬植物生長”的重要研究內容。

sentences.english: Eurasian herb with white or pinkish flowers in a terminal corymb.
sentences.chinese: 歐亞草本植物，傘房花序末端開白色或淡紫色花。

sentences.english: Coarse herbs having small heads of greenish flowers followed by burrs with hooked bristles .
sentences.chinese: 一個粗糙草本屬，頭狀花序，呈綠色的花，鉤狀刺毛。

sentences.english: Inflorescence a corymbose cyme , leaf-opposed or pseudo terminal, often at tips of tendrils.
sentences.chinese: 花序傘房狀聚傘花序，對生或，通常在頂部的卷鬚。

sentences.english: Inflorescence a corymbose cyme , leaf-opposed or pseudo terminal, often at tips of tendrils.
sentences.chinese: 花序傘房狀聚傘花序，對生或，通常在頂部的卷鬚。

sentences.english: Eurasian primrose with yellow flowers clustered in a one - sided umbel .
sentences.chinese: 歐亞報春花，花黃色，叢生於單側的傘形花序。

sentences.english: A single branch may bear several catkins .
sentences.chinese: 一根枝條可着生幾個花序。

sentences.english: Propagation is achieved through turions, which commonly occur in the inflorescences. Flies ( Insecta ;
sentences.chinese: 寬葉澤苔草主要通過發生在花序上的珠芽進行繁殖。

sentences.english: The achenes need to be disconnected from the capitulum before they germinate.
sentences.chinese: 瘦果在萌發之前必須與頭狀花序分離。

sentences.english: The flowers often form a conspicuous flat-topped umbel.
sentences.chinese: 其花朵常形成一個明顯的平頂傘形花序。

sentences.english: North American plant with spikes of yellow flowers, found in wet places.
sentences.chinese: 有黃色穗狀花序的北美植物，生長於溼潤地區。

definition: axillary bud/bud growing from axil of plant
ear (of corn or sorghum etc)/bunch (of grapes)/infructescence
